website_summaries.verdict: A bit pricier than dry dog food, but this canned food has extremely low levels of protein.
pros: Made in the U.S., so you can trust the quality of the ingredients
Tastes great, so the dog will maintain its appetite
Has only 2.5 percent minimum protein levels
Uses essential amino acids to allow the dog to maintain its lean muscle mass
cons: More expensive than most low protein dry dog foods

customer_reviews.title: Great savory beef stew flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I have two elderly Yorkies who needed to be put on special diets for health reasons. I was a little worried because it was a canned item, and they were used to eating lots of home cooking. But they just love this savory beef stew, and they can't wait for me to serve it up! I'm very happy with the way the cans are packaged, and they are delivered in a timely manner too. I will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Podgorski

customer_reviews.title: Reversed kidney failure in our 12 year old multipoo
customer_reviews.text: I add Thomas Labs Brewers Yeast and Garlic to increase the flavor. Our vet recommended this after our dog showed kidney failure from his blood work. We use all 3 caned flavors, dry and dog treats. After less than a year, the newest blood work shows normal! This flavor is the wettest of the 3 available. We really cut down on table scraps, but he still gets a tiny amount each day. Love this stuff. Likely adding years to his life expectancy.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Van Camp

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the food that much
customer_reviews.text: I thought my dog would like it but not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: special diet
customer_reviews.text: Our dog needs a special diet and he is doing very well with this food.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged with some cans open. Dog loves this ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged with some cans open. Dog loves this food, but at this price I don't expect to loss a 1/4 of the cans.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product, plus my pup liked it too!

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is what I expected but the price is $2.50 a can more expensive than what I can buy it from my vet...
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Shop around before you buy
customer_reviews.text: No doubt the product is good, my dog is fussy but never has she been so excited about eating. Switched to this after the vet told us my dog had k/d. Ordered food and after shipping paid $72 for 12 x 13 oz cans. Read reviews before the second order and was able to bag 24 x 13 oz cans for $20 less via chewy's.com
customer_reviews.author: Ian hunt

customer_reviews.title: His price is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.text: Come on, this is a ridiculous price. Go to Chewies for a decent price. Ripoff,here
customer_reviews.author: Gary Schuitema

product_meta.title: Hill's Pet Nutrition K/d Kidney Care Beef & Vegetable Stew Canned Dog Food, 12.5 oz, 12 Pack Wet Food
product_meta.description:
kidney care



The kidneys filter waste and toxins from the blood and maintain the normal balance of fluid and minerals within the body. As pets age, damage to kidney tissues may occur. This process is irreversible and leads to loss of kidney function. dogs with decreased kidney function may experience loss of appetite and their food intake might decline, which may lead to loss of muscle mass.

hill's nutritionists and veterinarians developed prescription diet K/D clinical Nutrition to support your dog's kidney function and help sustain muscle mass. In fact, the nutrition of K/D is clinically tested nutrition to improve & lengthen quality of life.
feature_bullets: Help slow the progression of chronic kidney disease
